targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time") as "time",
  devicename,
  avg(temp) AS avg_val
FROM awair_sensor_data
WHERE
  time >= $__timeFrom() AND time <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time"),
  devicename
ORDER BY
  "time" ASC

SELECT time_bucket((interval '$__interval') * $interval_multiplier, "time") AS time,
       avg(temp) AS avg_temp
FROM awair_sensor_data
WHERE deviceid = '117' AND "time" >= $__timeFrom() AND "time" <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time_bucket((interval '$__interval') * $interval_multiplier, "time") AS time,
       avg(temp) AS avg_temp
FROM awair_sensor_data
WHERE deviceid = '19796' AND "time" >= $__timeFrom() AND "time" <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time") as "time",

GROUP BY

ORDER BY

SELECT time_bucket((interval '$__interval') * $interval_multiplier, "time") AS time,
       avg(co2) AS avg_co2
FROM awair_sensor_data
WHERE deviceid = '117' AND "time" >= $__timeFrom() AND "time" <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time_bucket((interval '$__interval') * $interval_multiplier, "time") AS time,
       avg(co2) AS avg_co2
FROM awair_sensor_data
WHERE deviceid = '19796' AND "time" >= $__timeFrom() AND "time" <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  
    -- deviceid,
    devicename,
    LAST(temp, time) AS temp,
    LAST(humid, time) AS humid,
    LAST(co2, time) AS co2,
    LAST(voc, time) AS voc,
    LAST(pm25, time) AS pm25
FROM 
    awair.awair_sensor_data
WHERE devicename = 'Bedroom'
GROUP BY 
    devicename
